Body:
pattern = ci_pattern.CIPatternUniform(normalization=1.0, regions=[(1, 4, 0,
    3), (6, 8, 0, 3)])
image = np.array([[0.0, 0.0, 0.0], [1.0, 1.0, 1.0], [2.0, 2.0, 2.0], [3.0, 
    3.0, 3.0], [4.0, 4.0, 4.0], [5.0, 5.0, 5.0], [6.0, 6.0, 6.0], [7.0, 7.0,
    7.0], [8.0, 8.0, 8.0], [9.0, 9.0, 9.0]])
frame = ci_frame.ChInj(frame_geometry=ci_frame.FrameGeometry.
    euclid_bottom_left(), ci_pattern=pattern)
trails = frame.parallel_trails_arrays_from_frame(image)
assert (trails[0] == np.array([[4.0, 4.0, 4.0], [5.0, 5.0, 5.0]])).all()
assert (trails[1] == np.array([[8.0, 8.0, 8.0], [9.0, 9.0, 9.0]])).all()
stacked_trails = frame.parallel_trails_stacked_array_from_frame(image)
assert (stacked_trails == np.array([[6.0, 6.0, 6.0], [7.0, 7.0, 7.0]])).all()
trails_line = frame.parallel_trails_line_binned_over_columns_from_frame(array
    =image)
assert (trails_line == np.array([6.0, 7.0])).all()
